title: How AidVault Works
subtitle: A simple, transparent process that turns your savings into real impact. Here's everything you need to know about saving with purpose.
processSubtitle: Five Simple Steps to Make a Difference
processDesc: From sign-up to impact—here's your journey with AidVault

steps.title: Create Your Account
steps.description: Sign up in minutes with just your email. No credit checks, no hidden fees. Your journey to purposeful saving starts here.

steps.title: Add Funds to Your Vault
steps.description: Deposit money anytime you want. There's no minimum—start with what you're comfortable with and build from there.

steps.title: Watch Your Savings Grow
steps.description: Track your progress on your personal dashboard. See your balance grow and watch your potential impact increase in real-time.

steps.title: Donate 20% to Education
steps.description: After 6 months, you become eligible to donate. 20% of your savings goes directly to providing school supplies and educational materials.

steps.title: See Your Impact & Repeat
steps.description: Receive updates on how your donation helped. Then start a new savings cycle and continue making a difference.

journeySubtitle: Watch Your Impact Grow Over Time
journeyDesc: Every time you add funds to your vault, you're not just saving for yourself—you're investing in a child's future. Here's what your journey looks like:
journeyFeatures: Visual progress toward your donation goal
faqDesc: Everything you need to know about saving and giving with AidVault

faqs.question: Why 6 months?
faqs.answer: The 6-month period helps you build a meaningful savings habit while accumulating enough to make a real impact. It also allows us to batch donations for maximum efficiency, reducing administrative costs and ensuring more of your contribution reaches children in need.

faqs.question: Why 20%?
faqs.answer: The 20% commitment is designed to be impactful yet sustainable. It allows you to save for your own goals while making a significant contribution to education. Many of our users find this balance motivating—you're building your future while investing in someone else's.

faqs.question: Where does my donation go?
faqs.answer: 100% of your donation goes to educational supplies and materials for children in need. We work with verified partner schools and organizations in 15+ countries. Every donation is tracked, and you'll receive updates on the specific impact your contribution made.

faqs.question: Can I donate more than 20%?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! When you reach your 6-month milestone, you can choose to donate anywhere from 20% up to 100% of your savings. Many users choose to give more when they're able, and every additional amount makes a bigger difference.

faqs.question: Can I withdraw my savings?
faqs.answer: Yes, your money is always yours. However, we encourage you to complete the 6-month cycle to maximize your impact. If you need to withdraw early, you can do so at any time, though the 20% commitment would apply to future savings cycles.

faqs.question: Is my money safe?
faqs.answer: Your funds are secured with bank-level encryption and held in regulated financial accounts. We use industry-standard security measures including 256-bit SSL encryption and two-factor authentication to protect your account and funds.
